name: Pokevolve: A Pokemon Match-3
description:
Pokevolve - catch them all!

Didn't post for a while, but now you can try my latest fan-made game where you can collect and catch 63-pixel art pokemon.

To do so, you need to connect at least 3 balls with a line. Connect more for bonus points. Each pokemon have a bounty score, once you got those points, it will unblock in your Pokeball! 

Credits to:

  • Sick Sadworld for pokeballs
  • Kattling for pixel art pokemon
  • skatefilter5 for pixel art tileset
  • Aiirenee for pixel art laboratory

Collect them all, and rate this game.

This is a fan-made game. All rights reserved by Pokemon and actual owners.
